author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008251

Play the free demo now for SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance. Experience an enhanced version of the first stage, Oboro Village. Master the way of the shinobi, execute the ninja arts with precision, and journey through a stylized world. Enjoy a thrilling challenge with enhanced ninja abilities, greater enemy variety, unlocked hidden trial and a modified shop system. Once you've conquered the stage, push your skills further by replaying it in Arcade Mode and aim for the highest score. Play the demo for free on PS5 & PS4. SHINOBI Art of Vengeance releases August 29.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #shinobi
title: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - Demo Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
🏀 Welcome to NBA Bounce — the ultimate family-friendly basketball game where little ballers get to shine on the court! Whether you're dribbling solo or teaming up with up to 4 players locally, NBA Bounce brings fast-paced 3v3 basketball action with easy-to-learn controls and tons of fun. 

🔥 Experience thrilling gameplay packed with: 

Exciting practice and party modes 

Custom MVP looks and unlockable gear 

Official NBA teams and mascots 

Hype commentators calling clutch plays 

Ready to step onto the court and chase highlight worthy moments? Whether you’re a rookie or a pro, NBA Bounce makes basketball accessible, fun, and full of energy for players of all ages. 

🎮 Coming soon to PlayStation!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: NBA Bounce - Gameplay Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

New adventures await the descendants of the hero, Erdrick!

DRAGON QUEST I & II HD-2D Remake is a stunning reimagining of the first two legendary adventures in The Erdrick Trilogy, brought together in one package.

Coming to PlayStation®5 on October 30, 2025.

*Development footage. Subject to change

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/ninja-gaiden-ragebound/

NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound - Available Now

From the acclaimed team behind Blasphemous, NINJA GAIDEN: Ragebound successfully unites the classic lore and gameplay of the Tecmo-developed (now KOEI TECMO GAMES) NINJA GAIDEN series from the classic era with the depth and intensity of the modern 3D entries. The best of both eras come together to create an epic and thrilling adventure.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #ninjagaiden 

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
title: Ninja Gaiden: Ragebound - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
